label: Behavior 16205092
summary: Vessel behavior pattern: navigating along a fixed route (the persistent alignment between COG and heading, combined with stable speed and negligible course deviation, indicates the vessel is following a straight, predefined maritime route; the position progression follows a linear trajectory moving south-southeast, approximated by the parametric equations: lat(t) ≈ 56.0895 - 0.0193 × t, lon(t) ≈ 16.2228 - 0.0003 × t, where t is normalized time index from 0 to 1 over the observed segment)
